description: Moved by pleas from neighborhood representatives and memories of conversations with Alex, unlocks the spiral override, giving councils direct access to adjust scoring rules.
Stories spread as fortunes shift overnight in the wake of local overrides, unleashing fierce debates—some neighborhoods celebrate newfound justice, others warn of dangerous new resentments.

Public meetings flare citywide as communities argue over how to use their scoring power: some demand abolition, others double down on their local rules, with conflict simmering just beneath the surface.
